publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2800 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Fur Farming (Prohibition) (Scotland) Bill - Suspension of Standing Ordersâ€”That the Parliament agrees that Rules 9.5.3B, 9.7.9 and 9.8.3 of the Standing Orders be suspended for the purposes of the Fur Farming (Prohibition) (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Euan Robson*
